content: Hi all - Looking for advice on how to request approval for deviating from US Core for our IG. Got this link from the webinar today https://confluence.hl7.org/display/CGP/US+Core+Variance+Request+Process, but I am not following how to even do step 1. Is there a link for where we add a new tracker item? Who are the CGP co-chairs who we need to email? #newbie cc: @Mark Roberts @Joshua Kelly
the new tracker would be in Jira. What IG are you talking about, and which committee owns it?
Hi @Grahame Grieve - This IG is CARIN for Digital Insurance Card (https://build.fhir.org/ig/HL7/carin-digital-insurance-card/) and it's sponsored by the PIE workgroup.
then you should ask the PIE co-chairs to help you with the general HL7 process
@Cille Kissel Watkins US Core variance request are submitted via a Jira ticket. Here is an example from Da Vinci Formulary: FHIR#34164
Thank you @Eric Haas and @Grahame Grieve! Submitted a request here: https://jira.hl7.org/browse/FHIR-34240 and will follow up with our PIE contacts to continue the process from here.
